pages.title: Navbar
pages.description: Main navigation bar for the Motion theme
pages.content: LinkBay-CMS
pages.styles: #navbar-Motion { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c5364); padding: 12px 20px; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } .navbar-brand { font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 700; color: #ffcc00; } .nav-link { color: white !important; font-weight: 500; margin-left: 15px; transition: color 0.3s; } .nav-link:hover { color: #ffcc00 !important; }

pages.title: Footer
pages.description: Footer section with about, explore and social links for Motion theme
pages.content:
About

LinkBay-CMS is your trusted partner for creating smart, scalable, and eMotional eCommerce experiences.

Explore
  • About Us
  • Collections
  • Contact
Follow Us

© 2025 LinkBay-CMS - All Rights Reserved

pages.title: Home
pages.description: Welcome to the future of eCommerce with LinkBay-CMS
pages.keywords: home, modern ecommerce, eMotions, cms, LinkBay-CMS
pages.content:
Build. Connect. Inspire.

Empower your ideas and turn them into thriving online stores. Your vision, our technology.

Start Now

Lightning Fast

Experience unmatched speed and performance, every step of the way.

Built with Love

Your business deserves care. Every detail matters in our platform.

Ready to Scale

Grow without limits, with a CMS designed for evolution.

Platform Features

SEO Optimization

Rank higher with built-in SEO tools and metadata controls.

Analytics Dashboard

Get real-time insights and track performance across your stores.

Theme Customizer

Edit your design live and publish in one click, no coding required.

What Our Users Say

"LinkBay-CMS revolutionized the way we handle our e-commerce. Incredibly intuitive!"

— Laura, Store Owner

"I built my brand with ease using their drag-and-drop builder. Highly recommend."

— Marco, Entrepreneur

Ready to Elevate Your Store?

Join LinkBay-CMS
pages.styles: #hero-eMotion { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c5364); min-height: 100vh; } #cta-btn { border: 2px solid #ffffff; font-weight: bold; transition: background-color 0.3s ease; } #cta-btn:hover { background-color: #ffffff; color: #0f2027; } #eMotion-icons i { margin-bottom: 10px; }

pages.title: About Us
pages.description: Learn more about LinkBay-CMS and our mission
pages.keywords: about us, our story, mission, values, LinkBay-CMS
pages.content:
Who We Are

At LinkBay-CMS, we believe in empowering businesses with powerful, intuitive, and customizable tools to create exceptional online stores.

Contact Us

pages.title: Collections
pages.content:
Our Collections

Discover curated sets of products, organized by style, season, or category. Find what inspires you.

View All Products

pages.title: Services
pages.description: Discover the services we offer to boost your online business
pages.keywords: services, ecommerce solutions, CMS features, support
pages.content:
What We Offer

Customizable Themes

Choose from modern themes and tailor them to your brand identity without writing code.

Integrated Payments

Accept payments easily via Stripe, with secure checkout and multiple currency support.

Advanced SEO Tools

Boost your store's visibility with built-in SEO options for all your products and pages.

Get Started
pages.styles: #services { background-color: #1e1e1e; color: #ffffff; } .btn-warning { background-color: #ffcc00; border: none; } .border { border-color: #ffcc00 !important; }

pages.title: Landing
pages.description: Powerful CMS to Launch and Scale Your Online Store
pages.keywords: landing, start now, ecommerce platform, linkbaycms
pages.content:
Launch Your Online Store Today

Everything you need to create, manage and scale your eCommerce business – all in one place.

Start Free Learn More
pages.styles: #landing-hero { background-color: #1e1e1e; color: #ffffff; padding: 100px 0; } .btn-warning { background-color: #ffcc00; border: none; } .btn-outline-light { border: 2px solid #ffffff; color: #ffffff; }

pages.title: Products
pages.content:
Explore Our Products

Find the best items for your business or personal use, updated in real-time.
pages.styles: #products-section { background-color: #f8f9fa; color: #1e1e1e; } #product-list .card { border: none; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } #product-list .card:hover { transform: scale(1.02); }
